name: Mostar
fun_fact: Fun fact: The iconic Stari Most bridge was destroyed in 1993 during the Bosnian War, but rebuilt in 2004 using the same Ottoman techniques from 1566 - UNESCO even recovered original stones from the Neretva River to rebuild it!
